modName: Berserk Dragonslayer retexture with Dragon language
summary: This is just my retexture of Phate3\'s great Berserk Dragonslayer.
descriptionHtml:
My first mod here on Nexus so hope will be OK in all ways.

I just retexture Phate3\'s Berserk Dragonslayer with Dragon language on it\'s blade and dragon skin handle.

INSTALL:

You still need to install Phate3\'s mod, this is just retexture for it!!!
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3143

After that just copy and replace dragonslayer folder in:
...\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons

That\'s all.

PERMISSION:
My retexture is free-to-use in other works but:
1) CREDIT Phate3 (he done all work on this great mod) and me for retexture.
2) SEND me PM that you rework my texture and link on your work. I as well like to see other modders work.

CREDITS:
Big thanks to Phate3 for his Berserk Dragonslayer
Big thanks to autors of http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dragon_language
author: RhinoM
